name: Z.I. - Zombie Infected
description:
The Game is a HD Zombie shooter Game FPS arcade style.Enjoy and try survival at final missions!

1.0.6 updated improvements in the walking animations in the graphic quality of the zombies and all the darkened bloods. only U$0.99 promotion per limited time!The normal price its U$4.99.Enjoy now!Play Game up to 200FPS!

version 1.0.5 available now.Now improved quality graphic of game!Enjoy!

Resolution 1360X768 or 1280X720p HD

How Install:

- Just download and click on file to install game!

Software Requeriments:

- Windows 7 64 bits or above

- OpenGL drivers 2.0 or above

Hardware Minimum Requeriments:

- CPU core duo 2.4ghz

- Memory 4gb ddr2 if ddr3 better

- Graphics Card Gforce gt210 or ATi R5(30-40FPS)
